summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York Public Affairs office, forwarding a link to a New York Times opinion piece about the Epstein indictment. It appears to be internal DOJ communication regarding media coverage.

events.title: NYT Opinion Piece on Epstein Indictment
events.description: The New York Times publishes an opinion piece discussing the indictment of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an internal DOJ email dated July 9, 2019.
It contains a link to a New York Times opinion article from July 8, 2019, about the Epstein indictment.
The email originates from the Public Affairs office of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document shows DOJ personnel monitoring media coverage related to the Epstein case.
